analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusalam citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno
analyzed: hetu paccayā kusalam citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na citta samuṭṭhāno

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ

original: nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na citta samuṭṭhāno ca na abyākataḥ na citta samuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: akusalam citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno
analyzed: hetu paccayā akusalam citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na citta samuṭṭhāno

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ

original: nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na citta samuṭṭhāno ca na abyākataḥ na citta samuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Kusalaṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: kusalam no citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Akusalaṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: akusalam no citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Abyākataṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam no citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa
